Package civitas.celestis.world.lifecycle

Class WorldThread<W extends World<?,?,?>>

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
civitas.celestis.world.lifecycle.WorldThread<W>
Type Parameters:
W - The type of world to handle
All Implemented Interfaces:
ThreadedModule, WorldManager<W>, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SyncWorldManager
public class WorldThread<W extends World<?,?,?>> extends Thread implements WorldManager<W>
A world manager thread. This can also be used directly as a single-core world manager.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Field Details

    • worlds

      @Nonnull protected final List<W extends World<?,?,?>> worlds
      The list of worlds.

    • times

      @Nonnull protected final Map<W extends World<?,?,?>,Long> times
      The map of the most recent tick times.

    • tickInterval

      protected final long tickInterval
      The tick interval. If ticking every world takes shorter than this interval, the thread will sleep to ensure that the tick delta is at least this interval.
